body.name: 8-Tier Over the Door Pantry Organizer with Sturdy Metal Shelves, Sleek Door Hanging Spice Storage Rack with High Visibility, Versatile Door Organization System for Kitchen Bedroom Bathroom
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 10 hrs 58 mins
features: Modern Material Design: Adopting a modern and durable 8-tier over the door organizer to enhance your space. This organizer is made of sturdy acrylic and metal materials, which not only have strong load-bearing capacity, but also have a transparent seasoning rack design that allows you to easily obtain seasonings, simplify food preparation, and save valuable time.

Multifunctional and large capacity: Whether it's organizing seasonings and cans in the kitchen, storing baby clothes and shoes in the bedroom, or optimizing pantry and bathroom space for snacks, toiletries, and towels, this pantry door organization maximizes storage efficiency in any setting.

Sturdy and Secure: Our pantry storage rack features spiral flat plates that ensure stable support, even with frequent use of the pantry door. Moreover, to accommodate uneven surfaces, we've included spiral suction cups with long screws for additional door stability.

Flexibility and Adjustability Organization: Benefit from the flexibility of the eight separate shelves, enabling you to adjust shelf height and spacing according to your specific requirements. The removable door spice rack plates further ensure the safety of your items, providing a secure storage solution.

Effortless Installation: Complete with all essential installation accessories and detailed instructions, our product ensures straightforward assembly, even for those with limited installation experience. For any issues, feel free to reach out to us at any time. Additionally, we offer a one-year warranty to provide you with added confidence in your purchase.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Better load-bearing! New design, the entire shelf is made of sturdy metal and acrylic, not only waterproof and rustproof, but also beautiful and exquisite! DAOTENGQL is a brand specializing in creating innovative home storage and organizational solutions This acrylic pantry door organizer can add uniqueness to every moment.

Previous page Do not peel off the protective film of the stable suction cup before completing other steps Next page 1 Strong Adhesive 2 Adjustable Baskets 3 Acrylic design 4 Easy Install

Is it easy to install? Yes, you can refer to our manual, and you will complete the installation within 5 minutes. Are there any points to pay attention to during installation? You need to tear off the film on the acrylic so that you can see the items on the shelf more clearly Can I peel off the suction cup protective film of the product in advance? No! During the installation process, you must remember not to peel off the protective film of the adhesive pad screen disc before completing other steps!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised at the excellent quality. The only question I have is why there are different widths of shelves. We were able to slightly bend the tabs to get six shelves. I also agree that the over the door hooks are too wide for an interior door. My hus band bent them to fit better. I would definitely buy again and recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not designed for standard American interior doors
reviews.reviewText: This over-the-door rack of shelves is definitely heavy duty! Because all the weight-bearing parts are strong metal, it can handle a LOT of weight. I was pleased that both the shelf sides and bottoms are sturdy metal. The clear plastic fronts have supports only on the ends, but are protected from being bowed out in front by a metal lip on the front of the shelf bottoms that restrains contents. I like that they are clear so you can easily see shelf contents, too. There are no backs on the shelves, so your door acts as the back, so you have to keep this in mind when filling them.This unit took longer to put together than it should have. The instructions lack a few details. For example, they don't call attention to the two support pieces that are finished on the bottom, which go on last. There is also no mention of why two of the "adhesive pad screw disks" have longer screws, so don't screw all the way in, nor is anything said about the two screw caps, which don't seem to belong anywhere. I also ended up with THREE extra discs. There were a number of extra holes where I could have used them, but they were all too large. I'm usually pretty good at this kind of simple assembly, but had to fight inserting one shelf into its slots for over 10 minutes. The slots were on either side of a junction. The rest were fine. When assembling this, getting the screw discs really tight makes a difference in stabilizing the two supports.As far as improvements I would appreciate go, the first would of course be either a way to adjust the spacing on the hook at the top, or to have it fit a standard interior door without all the overhang. It's nearly 2" wide on the inside, and my standard door measured 1 3/8". Second, when attaching the rack to the door, having something like a 3M removable tape strip would be so much nicer, since it would not cause damage when removed. Third, having more slots (where the shelf hooks attach) that are spaced a little closer would have enabled me to use all 6 shelves rather than just 5.Other than those considerations, this is a strong unit that holds quite a bit, and at the current price seems to be a good buy as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for spices, herbs, teas and similar smaller items
reviews.reviewText: Item: DAOTENGQL 6-Tier Over the Door Pantry OrganizerPrice: $29.99We've just added-completed a small walk-in pantry in our kitchen. I’m using Amazon vendored and independently standing 12-inch deep metal-wire shelving units. This provides good storage capacity for larger boxed and bagged items and flexibility in moving the storage units around. But those shelves are deep, and the only available wall space I have left required a wide (16-inch) system, but also shallow, like under 6-inches. This so we could have room to work our large item storage on the opposite wall.I’m going to mount this unit directly to an un-used wall section in the new pantry. The minor modification I’ll be making is to delete the ‘over the door’ clips. I’ll be fastening the rails to the wall directly. In my humble opinion, it would have been great if the manufacturer had made the ‘over the door’ feature ‘included but removable.’ Then there'd be an option to either direct mount to a wall or ‘hang on a door.' That, in my opinion, would allow changing the installation without having to do any 'physical reworking' of the unit.As an organizer I found that it’s actually fairly priced. Had I purchased six individual containers of the same size and then used wall-mount hardware, my expense would have been greater than the storage unit’s current price point. So for me, this was certainly a good value item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cheap object at an expensive price
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this to use on the back of my linen closet door. It is somewhat useful, but not as much as I would have hoped. The instructions were terrible. I lucked out and randomly put the support bars together in the right order. I have finally figured out what the different lengths of screw on adhesive disks are for, but of course I did not put them where they needed to be. The longer ones can go in any slot using the little metal cap to secure them to the supports. This will take care of the issue with door panels being uneven, as they can be put in numerous different positions to account for sunken surfaces where the normal connection point is. With only two long "accessories," I cannot affix it securely because of where my door panels are, as I would need four (standard US door). I am actually afraid to use their adhesive, anyway, as I do not want to take the chance of it not coming off without damage (no information is given on that). The hooks at the top are also much bigger than my door, and stick out a fair bit into the hall. It is adjustable in that you can choose to put the shelves in multiple places, but the supports are too short to give viable options. I need one shelf a little taller to fit spray bottles, so that means another shelf can only hold extremely short things. It really needs one more extension on the supports to make it truly adjustable and useful. The shelves are thin metal with an acrylic front piece. Some of mine were already a bit bent up when I got it. There is a slight gap at the back because it cannot fit flush with a paneled door.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This over the door storage rack is a great option. Assembly was a breeze, no tools required. The shelves can be placed where they will work best for you. The fronts are a see through plastic/acrylic piece that slides into slots on the edges. The "screws" have a sticky so you can secure the unit to your door.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and assembly was a breeze!
reviews.reviewText: The overall rack is very sturdy and sticks well in place. I also like the visibility of the shelves which makes it easy to locate items quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: The rack went together very easily and quickly, about five minutes from box to back of the door. Holds a lot of cans and other pantry related items. Opened up space in my pantry while using another available space that was not be utilized. Feels rugged and secure, hoping it holds up for a few years.
